hypothesis_content.title: Gas Spike + Altcoin Momentum → High-Beta Alts Outperformance
hypothesis_content.statement: A sharp single-day gas price spike (>100% increase) during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes triggers immediate (next 3 days) outperformance of high-utility Ethereum altcoins (e.g., GRT, CRV) versus low-utility memecoins (e.g., PEPE, DOGE).
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sudden gas spikes reflect urgent, real network demand (DeFi, NFTs, data), favoring projects with actual utility and gas-sensitive use cases. Memecoins, driven purely by sentiment, see no direct benefit.
entry_conditions: Daily avg gas price increases >100% vs prior day
Crypto regime is NEUTRAL or BULL (confidence > 60%)
Enter long basket: GRT, CRV, BAT; short basket: PEPE, DOGE, TRUMP

exit_conditions.take_profit: Spread (long basket vs short basket) reaches +8%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The long utility/short meme basket fails to generate a positive median return within the 3-day window in >50% of historical instances.
